Name: caption
Description: String to be displayed on dialog

Name: name
Description: Identification name (in alphanumeric characters only). It is required only when the condition has multiple values.

Name: axis
Description: Specify on which side to show Y-axis.

Name: axislog
Description: true when you want to make the vertical axis log

Name: axisreverse
Description: true when you want to reverse the vertical axis

Name: span
Description: true when you want to define values at spans

Name: step
Description: true when you want to show the chart as bar chart

Name: hide
Description: true when you want to hide the data from chart
